Text:
So, as you can clearly see - there is "The Scene" and those who re-encode or change container and nothing more.

This is what a monopoly will get you. Three days late and a dollar short. Damaged goods don't get rectified and a whole community is beholden to the whims of the few.

If you can cap, edit & encode this stuff - UseNet with SSL is the most secure way of posting anonymously.

Trust me, you do it - I'll find it.
